title: Fix calendar visibility issue in appointment dialog

requirements.summary: Fix the calendar component in the New Appointment dialog so that the entire calendar is visible instead of only half being shown
acceptanceCriteria: The calendar in the New Appointment dialog shows all dates of the current month without any being cut off
All calendar navigation controls (month/year selector, arrows) are fully visible
The calendar maintains proper spacing and layout on mobile devices
Users can see and select any date in the calendar without scrolling or resizing the dialog

file_operations.description: Fix the calendar visibility issue by adjusting the dialog content height and calendar container styling. Ensure the calendar popover has sufficient z-index and the dialog content allows proper calendar display without being cut off. Update the Popover content wrapper to prevent clipping and ensure full calendar month visibility on mobile devices.
